CustomField.description: Enable the sender to also sign the agreement by selecting a signature order.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enable the sender to also sign the agreement by selecting a signature order.
CustomField.label: Sender Signature Order

value.fullName: Recipients sign first, then sender signs
value.label: Recipients sign first, then sender signs

value.fullName: Sender signs first, then recipients sign
value.label: Sender signs first, then recipients sign
